about_the_game:
Warmage: Prologue is a free version of Warmage. Discover and explore the universe and core gameplay of this tactical roguelite and get a preview of the experience that awaits you in the full game.



Warmage: Prologue is a roguelite grid-based turn-based tactical combat game where you play as a young warmage tasked with defending his city against an unknown evil.

Features:

  • Play as 3 different archetypes with unique gameplay
  • Varied and refreshing tactical combat
  • After each battle, power up your warmage and buy various attacks and items
  • Choose your next mission on the city map carefully
  • Differents objectives for each battle
  • Over 45 spells and 38 items to combine to create the ultimate warmage

Fight

Use a wide variety of weapons and spells to defeat waves of ennemies in a turn by turn combat. Various ennemies will challenge you in different ways, think carefully about each movement and each attack as a single error can put you in perilous situations.

Upgrade

Use the gems collected during the fights to buy new spells, upgrade the ones you already have and buy new items. With each level gained, you can upgrade one of you primary caracteristic which will improve the power of your attacks.

Burn them all

Now that you have a deadly warmage with powerfull spells, defeat all whom will stand in your way !

Use your environment

The surroundings aren't just for show, they can be your greatest ally in escaping deadly situations. Learn to harness them to your advantage !

Defend your city

Your city is attacked by an unkown evil. You have to help the citizens, others warmages and important people to survive!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 - 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.4GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB VRAM
  • Storage: 3 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or more - 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel HD Graphics 5000 or better
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB VRAM
  • Storage: 3 MB available space

short_description: Your city is under attack Warmage ! In this grid-based turn-based roguelite, defend the many different districts of your city against waves of enemies with the help of one of your students, and in between, buy and upgrade spells to prepare for the worst.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
